What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.Computer has Shuko in play with two or more creatures
2.Computer attaches/reattaches Shuko to a creature
3.Computer repeats this excessively What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Shuko should attach Shuko a few times (maximum 4 or 5 say)
instead of until it randomly "chooses" to What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.43 on Mac Mountain Lion If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below. This is not a bug but reduces game enjoyment while you wait for this to resolve each
